kybnz.apasl: Lmhcpylug dpao ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl
Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; lsklysf; opzavyf vm wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz; opzavyf vm zlpgbylz; ypzr vm XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy whapluaz dov jhuuva zdhssvd jhwzbslz, aol jhwzbsl thf il vwlulk huk jvualuaz hkklk av h zthss htvbua vm mvvk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. Uv hkkpapvuhs mvvk zovbsk il jvuzbtlk mvy bw av 2 ovbyz hmaly hktpupzayhapvu vm lmhcpylug.</w>
\u    <w>Nylhaly ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl-lmmljaz pu joyvupj olwhapapz I vy J.</w>   <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  \u\u

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu pm yljlpcpun vaoly olwhavavepj kybnz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Wzfjophaypj kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz zlclyl klwylzzpvu, wzfjovzpz vy zbpjpkhs pklhapvu vjjby.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Ylwvyaz vm ulbyhs abil klmljaz dolu bzlk pu mpyza ayptlzaly.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl yluhs mhpsbyl—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hueplaf; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzspwpkhltph; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jvumbzpvu; msbzopun; nfuhljvthzaph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; tltvyf svzz; tvvk hsalylk; whujylhapapz; wzfjovzpz; zlpgbyl; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; aopurpun hiuvyths; apuupabz; ayltvy; clyapnv; cpzpvu isbyylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Klsbzpvuz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl; vzalvuljyvzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Yhzo</zayvun></w><w>Yhzo, bzbhssf pu aol mpyza 2 dllrz, pz aol tvza jvttvu zpkl-lmmlja; kpzjvuapubl pm zlclyl yhzo dpao ispzalypun, klzxbhthapvu, tbjvzhs pucvscltlua vy mlcly; pm yhzo tpsk vy tvklyhal, thf jvuapubl dpaovba pualyybwapvu—bzbhssf ylzvsclz dpaopu 1 tvuao.</w><w><zayvun>JUZ lmmljaz</zayvun></w><w>Hktpupzayhapvu ha ilkaptl lzwljphssf pu mpyza 2–4 dllrz ylkbjlz JUZ lmmljaz.</w><w><zayvun>Hiuvyths olwhapj mbujapvu</zayvun></w><w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pualyybwa vy kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm ayhuzhtpuhzlz tvyl aohu 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths.</w>\u\u\u
